Sebastian is a mechanical engineering student with a keen interest in open science and has been a member of the Global Health Engineering Group for over a year. He wrote his bachelor's thesis with the group and continued with an internship as a research assistant. Currently, he is part of the openwashdata project and contributing to data processing of the published data packages.
